1.0.name: wordpress/edd-changelog
1.0.description:
This plugin requires  1.6 or greater.

When using the Easy Digital Downloads plugin to sell digital downloads, this plugin will allow you to optionally add a change log and version number to each of your downloads.

What does EDD Changelog do?

It does a few things...

  • It adds a metabox to the download post page that allows you to enter the change log and the current version number.
  • It'll automatically append the change log at the end of the download's product page in a collapsible container. If you do not want to automatically append the change log, there is an option to turn this feature off per download.
  • It also adds a new shortcode, [edd_changelog]. This shortcode when used on a download page will automatically show the current downloads change log. The shortcode has 4 options, id, toggle
